Episodes.Title: The Curtain Opens on the Battle! Son Goku Returns
Episodes.Director: Yasuhiro Nowatari, Osamu Kasai, Daisuke Nishio
Episodes.Writer: Akira Toriyama, Takao Koyama, Katsuyuki Sumizawa
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: The episode begins telling the story of Goku up to the present of the series. The episode goes on to introduce his son Gohan, named after Goku's grandfather. Although a stranger appears in a space pod in search of someone by the n...

Episodes.Title: Teki wa Gokû no ani!? Saikyô senshi Saiya-jin no himitsu
Episodes.Director: Yasuhiro Nowatari, Osamu Kasai, Kazuhisa Takenouchi
Episodes.Writer: Akira Toriyama, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Takao Koyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: The stranger reveals himself to Goku and his friends, as well as Goku's origin. Goku then tries to deny the information given to him. Is the stranger good or evil?

Episodes.Title: A Battle with Their Lives on the Line! Goku and Piccolo's Fierce Suicidal Attack!
Episodes.Writer: Toshiki Inoue, Takao Koyama, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Despite the fury of their attacks, Goku and Piccolo are unable to land a death blow in their battle against Raditz. Gohan's unexpected outburst manages to weaken the powerful Saiyan, but it may be too little, too late.

Episodes.Title: Gotta Run in the Afterlife, Son Goku! The One Million Kilometer Snake Road
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Keiji Terui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Now that he's dead, Goku must fight to survive in the afterlife, especially during his treacherous trek down Snake Way. Back on Earth, Gohan endures his own punishment as a student in the house of Piccolo!

Episodes.Title: Survival at Wildness! The Moonnight Lets Gohan Watch Further!
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Keiji Terui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Piccolo tries to toughen up Gohan with some wilderness survival training, but things get hairy when the young Saiyan sees his first full moon! Meanwhile, Yajirobe summons Earth's strongest fighters to Kami's Lookout.

Episodes.Title: Final Reached the End! The Strange Exam of Kaio
Episodes.Writer: Toshiki Inoue, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Toshio Furukawa
Episodes.Plot: As the deadly Saiyan invaders approach Earth, Gohan makes slow, but steady, progress under the watchful eye of Piccolo, and Goku struggles with the "gravity" of his training under King Kai.

Episodes.Title: Battle with 10-Fold Gravity! Goku, Your Training in a Footrace
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Toshio Furukawa
Episodes.Plot: To prove himself worthy of King Kai's training, Goku must test his mettle against a fleet-footed monkey and a powerful cricket that's big on respect. Meanwhile, in the land of the living, Gohan takes a beating from his monstrous m...

Episodes.Title: Come Forth, Shenron! The Saiya-jin Finally Arrive on Earth
Episodes.Writer: Keiji Terui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Toshio Furukawa
Episodes.Plot: Goku's training under King Kai is finally complete, and he's eager to return to Earth. Master Roshi uses the Dragon Balls to summon Shenron, but will Goku make it back in time to stop the Saiyans?

Episodes.Title: Yamcha's Hard Struggle! The Terrifying Saibaimen
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: The Saiyans have arrived, Goku isn't even on the planet, and the overmatched Z-Fighters represent Earth's last line of defense. When Vegeta and Nappa unleash the gruesome Saibamen, Yamcha picks a fight that could be his last!

Episodes.Title: Wait, Chaozu!! Tenshinhan's Screaming Kikoho
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Toshio Furukawa
Episodes.Plot: Krillin's furious attack wipes out the Saibamen, but the Z-Fighters are powerless against the Saiyan warlords. One by one, Earth's defenders suffer devastating injuries - or fall in battle. Goku's return is their only hope for sur...

Episodes.Title: Will Son Goku Make It?! The Battle Resumes in 3 Hours
Episodes.Writer: Toshiki Inoue, Takao Koyama, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Toshio Furukawa
Episodes.Plot: Piccolo hatches a desperate plan to prolong the battle until Goku's arrival. When Vegeta senses an awesome source of power approaching, he orders Nappa to dispose of remaining Z-Fighters - starting with Gohan!

Episodes.Title: The Tears Piccolo Shed... Son Goku's Furious Counterattack!
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Toshio Furukawa
Episodes.Plot: Goku arrives in time to save Gohan and Krillin, and the resurrected warrior is eager to put the hurt on Nappa. When it becomes clear that Goku is no ordinary fighter, Prince Vegeta steps into to finish the fight himself!

Episodes.Title: This Is the Kaio-ken!! A Battle to the Limit: Goku vs Vegeta
Episodes.Writer: Keiji Terui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: The stage is set for a final showdown between Vegeta and Goku. The Saiyan Prince is stronger, faster, and far more ruthless. Goku's only hope for victory is a technique that may very well destroy him!

Episodes.Title: Kamehameha Clash! Vegeta's Tenacious Grand Transformation
Episodes.Writer: Toshiki Inoue, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: Vegeta can't handle the fury of Goku's triple Kaio-Ken technique, so the Saiyan warlord unleashes his inner ape. Weakened by his furious onslaught, Goku's only hope to defeat the beast is the mighty Spirit Bomb!

Episodes.Title: Goku in Absolute Peril! Entrust Your Wishes to the Genki-dama
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Keiji Terui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: As Goku lies exhausted and vulnerable on the field of battle, Gohan and Krillin take aim at Vegeta's only weakness: his tail! If they can take the ape out of the fight, they might have a chance to escape with their lives.

Episodes.Title: The Invincible Vegeta Defeated! Son Gohan Summons a Miracle
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: Krillin and Gohan team up to blast Vegeta with a Spirit Bomb, but the Saiyan prince refuses to die. Things look bad for the Z-Fighters until Yajirobe distracts the enemy long enough for Gohan to undergo a transformation of his own!

Episodes.Title: Dawn of the Fierce Battle... The Planet of Hope Is Piccolo's Homeland
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: Vegeta has been defeated, but there's no time to celebrate. The Z-Fighters must find a way to resurrect the friends who died stopping the Saiyan invasion. Fortunately for the fallen, Krillin has a plan!

Episodes.Title: The Spaceship that Sleeps in Yunzabit! Blast Off for Planet Namek
Episodes.Writer: Keiji Terui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Preparations for the journey to Namek hit a snag when Bulma accidentally blows up the remaining Saiyan spaceship. Mr. Popo may know of another vessel, so he and Bulma travel to the Earth's end for a closer look.

Episodes.Title: A Formidable New Enemy! Emperor of the Universe, Freeza
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Aya Matsui, Keiji Terui
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: A bad case of space boredom makes Bulma a pain to share close quarters with, and Vegeta recovers from his injuries only to discover that Frieza has a head start on tracking down the magic Dragon Balls!

Episodes.Title: Rebellion Against Freeza! Vegeta, Burning with Ambition
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Gohan and Krillin beat up on Frieza's henchmen, but their spaceship is destroyed in the process. Vegeta is headed for a showdown with Cui, and the shrewd Saiyan is keeping his true power level under wraps!

Episodes.Title: Protect the Dragonballs! The Namekian Offensive
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Naoko Watanabe
Episodes.Plot: Goku blasts off in a brand new spaceship specially equipped with a device designed to help increase his strength! On Namek, Krillin and Gohan watch in horror as Frieza's men slaughter innocent Namekians.

Episodes.Title: Dodoria in Terrifying Hot Pursuit! Vegeta Learns the Truth
Episodes.Writer: Keiji Terui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Gohan and Krillin risk their lives to rescue a young Namekian, and Vegeta goes on the rampage after learning the truth about the destruction of his home planet!

Episodes.Title: Vegeta's Secret Maneuvering! The Namekians Are Tragically Attacked
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: After easily defeating Dodoria, Vegeta begins his violent search for the two remaining Dragon Balls. Meanwhile, Krillin and his new friend Dende set out to warn the eldest Namekian of the horror headed his way!

Episodes.Title: Resurrected Comrades! The Handsome Warrior Zarbon's Devilish Transformation
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Toshio Furukawa
Episodes.Plot: King Kai telepathically "phones" Goku with a warning to stay as far away from Frieza as possible! Back on Namek, Vegeta is shocked to discover how much a simple transformation can increase Zarbon's power.

Episodes.Title: Its a Power-Up, Krillin! Freeza's Nagging Premonition
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: The eldest Namekian unlocks the full force of Krillin's dormant power, so the bald brawler can better protect his Dragon Ball. Elsewhere, a Saiyan-related premonition prompts Frieze to call for reinforcements.

Episodes.Title: The Plot Is Smashed! The Counterattack, Vegeta vs. Zarbon
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Keiji Terui
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Vegeta lays it on the line in a daring attempt to steal the Dragon Balls right out from under Frieza's nose. Krillin's riding high on a Namekian power surge, but he's about to wander into a dogfight he can't survive!

Episodes.Title: A Hair-Trigger Pinch! Gohan, Protect the Four-Star-Ball
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Aya Matsui, Katsuyuki Sumizawa
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Intimidated by Vegeta's superior strength, Krillin reluctantly surrenders his precious Dragon Ball. A glimmer of hope remains after Gohan secures a ball of his own - but the young warrior is headed for a beat-down courtesy of Vegeta!

Episodes.Title: The Super Decisive Battle Draws Near! The Ginyu Special-Squad Has Arrived!
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Vegeta intercepts Krillin and Gohan on their mad dash to get powered up by the Eldest Namekian, but larger problems loom on the horizon. Brace yourselves for the arrival of the Ginyu Force!

Episodes.Title: The Special-Squad's Frontline Man! Break Gurudo's Spell
Episodes.Writer: Keiji Terui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Episodes.Plot: Gohan and Krillin fight to survive against Guldo, a member of the Ginyu Force who possesses awesome psychic abilities! With Goku still in space and Vegeta their only ally, things look bleak for Earth's heroes.

Episodes.Title: The Hellish Rikuum! Keep Me Entertained, Vegeta-chan
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Episodes.Plot: Vegeta ramps his battle power up to impressive levels, but he's still no match for the Ginyu goons. To escape death, he'll need help from some heroic former enemies. Meanwhile, Frieza tries to unlock the magic of the Dragon Balls!

Episodes.Title: Son Goku Finally Arrives! Knock the Ginyu Special-Squad Around
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Keiji Terui
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: At long last, Goku finally completes his journey from Earth and arrives on planet Namek. His friends are gravely injured, but the mighty Saiyan warrior has a bag full of magic beans and a powerful secret!

Episodes.Title: The Star Performer Takes the Stage?! Captain Ginyu vs Son Goku
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Keiji Terui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: As Frieza prepares for his ruthless interrogation of the Eldest Namekian, Goku shows off the benefits of training in gravity one hundred times that of Earth. Will it be enough to help him defeat Captain Ginyu?

Episodes.Title: Son Goku at Full Power! The Terrified Ginyu Has Something Up His Sleeve?!
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Frieza locates the Eldest Namekian, but Nail intercepts the evil entity, risking his own life to preserve the Dragon Balls. Elsewhere, Gohan and Krillin rescue a damsel from some dinosaurs, and Goku continues his battle with Cpt. ...

Episodes.Title: Surprise! Goku Is Ginyu and Ginyu Is Goku?!
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: Gohan and Krillin unearth the Dragon Balls, but their attempts to summon Shenron fail miserably. Later, Cpt. Ginyu's devious strategy forces Earth's warriors to do the unthinkable: attack Goku's flesh and bones with chilling feroc...

Episodes.Title: A Great Turnabout for Goku?! Super Shenron, Come Out Right Now!
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Episodes.Plot: Goku and his body are reunited, but the noble Saiyan is severely injured and unable to fight. A Namekian messenger rushes to assist Gohan and Krillin in summoning Shenron, but there's no guarantee he'll arrive before Frieza.

Episodes.Title: An Enraged Freeza Draws Near! Porunga... Grant This Wish!
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Episodes.Plot: Kami and King Kai concoct a plan to restore the wish-granting power of the Namekian Dragon Balls, and Goku continues his epic battle with the villainous Frieza!

Episodes.Title: A Nightmarish Super Transformation! Freeza's Battle Power Reaches One Million
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Piccolo is resurrected and ready to rumble, but his arrival is delayed by an encounter with a dying Namekian. Meanwhile, Vegeta prepares to throw down with Frieza, but the Saiyan prince may be badly overmatched.

Episodes.Title: Freeza Bares His Fangs! Transcendent Power Attacks Gohan
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Episodes.Plot: Vegeta is impressed by Gohan's furious outburst after Frieza strikes a death blow against Krillin. The two Saiyans work together to defeat the monster, but even their combined powers won't be enough spare their lives!

Episodes.Title: The Reborn Piccolo Arrives! A Furious Freeza's 2nd Transformation
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Episodes.Plot: Piccolo joins the battle in progress and quickly attacks Frieza with the strength of two Namekian warriors. The powerful villain is caught off guard, but a second transformation gives him the strength to finish the fight once and ...

Episodes.Title: Freeza's Last Super Transformation! A Terror Greater Than Hell Begins
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Episodes.Plot: Frieza has begun his ultimate transformation, and Vegeta's only hope to defeat the monster is suffering a mortal wound. If the Saiyan warrior can convince Dende to restore his strength, he may gain the power to defeat his enemy!

Episodes.Title: The Moment We've Waited For! Son Goku Is Revived
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Episodes.Plot: Vegeta gives his increased power and speed a test run by launching a violent attack on Frieza, but no matter how furiously he fights, the Saiyan is unable to penetrate his enemy's defenses!

Episodes.Title: Defeat Freeza, Son Goku! The Proud Vegeta's Tears
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Episodes.Plot: Goku arrives at the battle scene only to find Vegeta battered and badly beaten. With his dying breath, the Saiyan prince reveals the truth about Frieza's roll in the death of Goku's father, prompting a fierce outburst of Saiyan pr...

Episodes.Title: Son Goku vs Freeza! The Curtain Opens on the Super Decisive Battle!
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Goku and Frieza go head to head in a vicious slugfest that threatens to destroy the planet of Namek. Krillin and Gohan are amazed by the brutality of the battle, but Piccolo believes two warriors are just warming up!

Episodes.Title: A Physical War That Exceeds All Limits! Goku and Freeza and Ginyu, Again?!
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: The bruises are multiplying as Goku and Frieza continue to pummel each other mercilessly! Meanwhile, Bulma's encounter with an unusual frog leads to an out-of-body experience!

Episodes.Title: It's a 20-Fold Kaio-ken! A Kamehameha with Everything on the Line
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: After suffering a savage beating at the hands of Frieza, Goku summons the awesome power of the Kaio-Ken! If his desperate attack succeeds, victory will be his, but if it fails, the Saiyan race will be eliminated!

Episodes.Title: This Is the Last Trump Card! Goku's Extra-Large Genki-dama
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Episodes.Plot: When his most powerful attacks fail to faze Frieza, Goku turns to his ultimate weapon: the Spirit Bomb! Piccolo joins the fight to buy Goku some time, but can the noble Namekian survive long enough to taste sweet victory?

Episodes.Title: Awaken, Legendary Warrior... Son Goku, the Super Saiyan!
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: With the help of his friends, Goku succeeds in blasting Frieza with a gargantuan Spirit Bomb! Victory seems assured, but when the monster remerges to strike a shockingly fatal blow - Goku undergoes a powerful transformation!

Episodes.Title: The Angry Super Saiyan! Throw Your Hat in the Ring, Son Goku!
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Ryûsei Nakao, Jôji Yanami
Episodes.Plot: While Gohan races to save Piccolo, Goku inflicts a Super-Saiyan beating on Frieza. The blonde brawler's impressive new powers drive his opponent to a desperate counterattack that could obliterate Namek!

Episodes.Title: Exact Vengeance, Son Goku! The Countdown to the Planet's Collapse
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Ryûsei Nakao
Episodes.Plot: Despite the danger of Namek's impending implosion, Goku continues his battle with Frieza, determined to extract revenge for Krillin's murder. Elsewhere, Gohan tries to locate Bluma before it's too late!

Episodes.Title: Freeza's Do-or-Die Full Power! Shenlong, Heed This Wish
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Ryûsei Nakao
Episodes.Plot: The epic battle between Goku and Frieza continues. Meanwhile, King Kai and Kami initiate a plan with the Dragon Balls.

Episodes.Title: Goku's Furious Battle Cry! Make It in Time... The Resurrection Wish!
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Tôru Furuya
Episodes.Plot: After Goku is seemingly defeated by Frieza, Gohan enters the fight to avenge the loss of his father. Meanwhile, a newly resurrected Dende rushes to make a final wish before planet Namek is destroyed.

Episodes.Title: Two Remain on a Vanishing Planet! This Is the Final Showdown
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Toshio Furukawa
Episodes.Plot: Goku and Frieza continue their epic battle as planet Namek crumbles beneath their feet. Back on Earth, Gohan eagerly awaits word of his father's ultimate fate!

Episodes.Title: Son Goku's Final Blow... Planet Namek Scatters Throughout Space
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Toshio Furukawa
Episodes.Plot: Goku's ill-advised display of mercy leads to a treacherous final attack by Frieza. As the epic battle between the two warriors reaches its climax, planet Namek teeters on the brink of ultimate destruction!

Episodes.Title: Goku Vanishes in Space... Super Warriors, Return to Life!
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Frieza is defeated, Namek has been obliterated, and the whereabouts of Goku remain a mystery. How will Earth carry on without its Super Saiyan hero? And what will become of the Namekian refugees?

Episodes.Title: That's Earth, Papa... Freeza and His Father Strike Back
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Aya Matsui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: The wreckage of Frieza's body is rebuilt by the monster's fiendish father! Together, they embark on a mission to eradicate life on Earth. Will Goku return home in time to save his friends?

Episodes.Title: I'll Defeat Freeza! Another Super Saiyan
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: The bone-chilling onslaught of Frieza and King Cold is brought to a halt by a mysterious stranger with a mighty sword, but only time will tell if this new warrior is friend or foe!

Episodes.Title: Welcome Back, Son Goku! The Confession of the Mysterious Boy, Trunks
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: The formidable stranger finally reveals the secret of his origins after a Super Saiyan sparring session with Goku. The oddly familiar fighter is a visitor from the future sent to deliver a grave warning!

Episodes.Title: Goku's New Technique, Instant Movement! Special Training Staked on 3 Years from Now
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Goku tells the amazing story of how he survived the destruction of Namek, and the heroic warriors begin their training for a looming showdown with the Androids!

Episodes.Title: The Pair Who Don't Leave a Trace! The Artificial Humans Appear
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Goku and his friends eagerly await the arrival of the Androids, but Yamcha's confrontation with the mechanized monsters suggests that Earth's heroes may be up against more muscle they can handle!

Episodes.Title: Attacked on Both Sides by an Internal Enemy?! Son Goku vs Artificial Human No. 19
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Goku tries to pulverize the Androids with a devastating display of his Super Saiyan strength, but a mysterious ailment prevents the mighty warrior from unleashing his true power!

Episodes.Title: No Chance of Victory Against No. 19! Super Vegeta Arrives Late
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Vegeta's sudden arrival creates an opening for the others to rescue Goku. While Yamcha rushes the fallen hero to safety, Vegeta reveals his new and improved fighting style - including the Big Bang Attack!

Episodes.Title: Piccolo's Assault! The Missing No. 20 and the Future Gone Eschew
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Goku wages a life and death battle with a deadly heart condition, Piccolo takes center stage in the battle to destroy Android 20, and Trunks returns from the future with a disturbing revelation.

Episodes.Title: Pursue Doctor Gero...! The Search for the Mysterious Laboratory!
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: While Piccolo and company search for Dr. Gero's secret laboratory, Vegeta sets out to hunt down and destroy Android 20. Meanwhile, Trunks tries everything in his power to save his stubborn father!

Episodes.Title: No. 17, No. 18, and...! The Artificial Humans Awaken
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: The newly activated Androids 17 and 18 provide a display of their unprecedented power and cruelty. Vegeta is eager to fight, but he soon finds himself outnumbered three to one!

Episodes.Title: A Cute Face, and Super Power?! No. 18 vs Vegeta
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: One by one, Vegeta and his reluctant allies meet horrific ends at the hands of the unstoppable Androids. A bed-stricken Goku is Earth's only hope, but there's a specially-designed Android waiting to destroy him!

Episodes.Title: The Time Has Come to Become One Again... Piccolo's Decision for Ultimate Power!
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Faced with an unbeatable enemy, Vegeta flies away in a solitary rage, and Piccolo seeks out Kami on a quest to increase his power by whatever means necessary!

Episodes.Title: One More Time Machine?! Bulma Unveils a Mystery
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: While Kami considers merging with Piccolo, Trunks and the others discover a second time machine. Elsewhere, Vegeta vows to become strong enough to defeat the Android invaders!

Episodes.Title: And So the Monster Makes Its Move... Take Off! It's the Super Namekian!
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: During their investigation of the second time machine, Gohan and company stumble upon the shell of what appears to be a monstrous creature. Later, a horrific vision forces Kami to accept his fate and merge with Piccolo!

Episodes.Title: I Am Your Brother! The Monster Who Possesses Goku's Ki
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: The Super Namekian formerly known as Piccolo finds himself face-to-face with the most terrifying monster the world has ever seen. Who is this new threat? And why does he have Goku's power?

Episodes.Title: A Devious Trick, the Taiyo-ken! Chase After the Artificial Human Cell
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: Cell - believing he has defeated Piccolo - foolishly reveals the mysteries of his hideous origins. Little does the monster know, the powerful Super Namekian cannot be conquered so easily!

Episodes.Title: Attack the Elusive Cell! Son Goku Is Finally Revived!
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Cell continues his bloodthirsty rampage, Krillin and Trunks destroy what little remains of Dr. Gero's laboratory, and Goku awakens from his extended slumber ready to fight!

Episodes.Title: Surpass Super Saiyan! Now, Into the Room of Spirit and Time
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: Goku leads his Saiyan brethren to a secret room designed for highly-advanced training. Meanwhile, Piccolo puts his enhanced powers to the test against an Android adversary!

Episodes.Title: This Is the Power of a Super Namekian! No. 17 vs Piccolo
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Piccolo and Android 17 trade blows in a battle of unprecedented brutality! Cell - sensing their presence - races to the scene of the skirmish in pursuit of his terrifying perfect form!

Episodes.Title: Run, No. 17! Piccolo's Suicidal Resistance
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Cell's arrival forces Piccolo and the Androids into an uneasy - and temporary - alliance. While the Super Namekian mounts a desperate, final attack, Goku and Gohan wait for Vegeta to emerge from the Room of Spirit and Time!

Episodes.Title: Unmeasured Power! The Silent Warrior No. 16 Makes His Move
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hikaru Midorikawa
Episodes.Plot: After defeating Piccolo, Cell turns his attention to his true prey: Androids 17 and 18. The monster must absorb them both to achieve his perfect form, but Android 16 still stands in his way!

Episodes.Title: Tenshinhan's Do-or-Die Shin Kikoho! Save Your Brother-in-Arms, Son Goku
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Desperate to help Android 18 escape, Tien places his own life at risk in an unwinnable battle with the monster Cell. When the three-eyed warrior's power quickly fades, he'll need a lift from a friend to avoid a gruesome end!

Episodes.Title: Super Saiyan Surpassed! The Daring Vegeta Strikes Cell
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama, Sumio Uetake
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Vegeta puts his new powers to the test in a shocking slugfest with Cell. Back in the Room of Spirit and Time, Goku attempts to teach Gohan the secret to a Super Saiyan transformation!

Episodes.Title: Cell's Surging Resentment! Krillin, Destroy No. 18
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Akira Toriyama, Sumio Uetake
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Vegeta is fighting Cell, can he destroy him before he combines with No.18? With the emergency shutdown in hand - can Krillin shut down No.18?

Episodes.Title: And So, the Situation Takes a Turn for the Worst... Cell Attacks No. 18!
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: As Cell successfully persuades Vegeta to let him reach his Perfect Form, Krillin attempts to get Android 16 and 18 to safety.

Episodes.Title: The Tables Have Turned! Perfect-Form Cell Finally Goes into Action
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: Krillin and Vegeta fight Perfect Cell, as Trunks prepares to reveal his true power. Meanwhile, Goku and Gohan continue training in the Hyperbolic Time Chamber.

Episodes.Title: Vegeta's Full-Power Strike! But Cell's Terror Grows and Grows
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: Vegeta uses his final attack in a desperate attempt to kill Cell.

Episodes.Title: The Awakening of Super Power! Trunks Has Surpassed His Father
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Trunks finally shows his true power and fights Cell.

Episodes.Title: The Television's Been Hijacked! A Live Broadcast of the Cell Games Press Conference
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Trunks informs the Z-Fighters of the tournament planned by Cell, and Android 16 is taken to Capsule Corporation to be repaired. Meanwhile, Goku and Gohan continue to train.

Episodes.Title: Training Completed! Does Goku Have the Composure to Defeat Cell?!
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Goku and Gohan complete their training in the Hyperbolic Time Chamber, and fly down from The Lookout to greet their friends.

Episodes.Title: The Interrupted Rest! The Self-Defense Army Launches a General Offensive Against Cell
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Piccolo and Vegeta train in the Hyperbolic Time Chamber, while Goku and Gohan relax at home.

Episodes.Title: A New God! The Dragonballs Are Finally Revived
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama, Sumio Uetake
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: In an attempt to revive the Dragon Balls, Goku tries to find the new planet where the Namekians are residing with the help of King Kai.

Episodes.Title: Satan's Legion Runs Wild! The Curtain Rises on the Cell Games
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: The Z-Fighters and Android 16 arrive at the Cell Games Arena, and Mr Satan along with his disciples get ready to fight Cell.

Episodes.Title: The Decisive Battle! Cell vs Son Goku
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: A Full Powered Super Saiyan Goku fights Cell.

Episodes.Title: A Battle of the Highest Level! Defeat Cell, Son Goku
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: The battle between Goku and Cell continues.

Episodes.Title: A Conclusion to the Death-Match! Goku's Decision Time
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: After failing to defeat Cell and spending the last of his energy, Goku surrenders and allows Gohan to be the next contestant to fight.

Episodes.Title: Get Angry, Gohan! Unleash Your Hidden Power
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: A Full Powered Super Saiyan Gohan fights Cell.

Episodes.Title: The Tears that Disappeared into the Sky! Gohan's Angry Super Awakening
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: The Cell Juniors fight the Z-Fighters, as Cell attempts to trigger Gohan's full power.

Episodes.Title: Fighting Spirit Free from Hesitation! Gohan Pulverizes the Cell Juniors
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: Gohan's anger ignites, transforming into a Super Saiyan 2.

Episodes.Title: The Perfect Form Breaks Down! This is the Super Iron Fist of Rage
Episodes.Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: Cell unleashes his full power upon Super Saiyan 2 Gohan.

Episodes.Title: Bye-Bye Everyone! This Is the Only Way to Save the Earth
Episodes.Writer: Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: As a desperate Cell prepares to self-destruct in an attempt to destroy the Earth along with him, Goku devises a last second plan to save everyone.

Episodes.Title: Combine Our Power! The Mightiest, Final Kamehameha
Episodes.Writer: Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Episodes.Plot: Super Perfect Cell and Gohan charge their Kamehameha attack for the final confrontation for the fate of the Earth.

Episodes.Title: Farewell with a Smile! Heading for New Days
Episodes.Writer: Takao Koyama, Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Episodes.Plot: Following Cell's defeat, Goku contacts his friends and family from the Otherworld and Krillin makes a surprise wish using the Dragon Balls.

Episodes.Title: Bring Peace to the Future! Goku's Spirit is Eternal
Episodes.Writer: Akira Toriyama
Episodes.Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Takeshi Kusao
Episodes.Plot: Trunks returns to the Future to reunite with his mother. With newfound strength he goes to destroy the Androids once and for all.
